content.question: According to the passage, an attempt by Congress to place limitations on presidential power through legislation led to which of the following?

choices.label: A signing statement by the president that declared that the legislation would not limit presidential power
A Supreme Court decision that ruled in favor of the power of Congress to check the president
A declaration of war against al-Qaeda as a result of the September 11 attacks
An impeachment proceeding against the president for abuse of power and violation of a treaty

content.answer: A signing statement by the president that declared that the legislation would not limit presidential power

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Describe the argument, perspective, evidence, and reasoning presented in the source.
